body.subtitle: A repository for any projects and notes on technologies that I create

text.para: This site is build using XML and XSLT as an expermient. It is inteneded to have the xml files built by combining various differnet files at request time. I will be looking into some form of caching to only regen if the input files are editied. and have things like includes (css) and menu (navbar) are definied in seaprate file.

It is my intension to build a generic web framework using xml/xslt mixed with HTMX and a classless css library of my own design similar to latex web and missing.style. This sjould allow for a server agnostic front end requiring only the data to be available via XML. I also intend to create some form of generic XML/XSLT document pipeline (write in XML, transform in XSLT, print to pdf)
